main_living_areas.name: Grand Foyer
main_living_areas.description: The imposing entrance with a sweeping staircase, chandelier, and possibly a ghostly butler.

main_living_areas.name: Grand Hall/Ballroom
main_living_areas.description: A vast, echoing space with a decaying dance floor, broken mirrors, and remnants of past celebrations.

main_living_areas.name: Library
main_living_areas.description: Floor-to-ceiling bookshelves, hidden passages, and cursed tomes. A perfect place for puzzles or lore.

main_living_areas.name: Dining Room
main_living_areas.description: A long table set for a meal that was never finished, with rotting food and spectral guests.

private_quarters.name: Master Bedroom
private_quarters.description: Lavish but eerie, with a four-poster bed, a vanity mirror that shows reflections of the past, and a locked wardrobe.

private_quarters.name: Children's Nursery
private_quarters.description: Creepy toys, a rocking chair that moves on its own, and drawings that hint at dark secrets.

private_quarters.name: Servants Quarters
private_quarters.description: Cramped, dusty rooms with personal belongings left behind, and whispers of past injustices.

utility_and_service_rooms.name: Kitchen/Pantry
utility_and_service_rooms.description: Rusty knives, spoiled food, and the sound of pots clanging when no one is there.

utility_and_service_rooms.name: Laundry Room
utility_and_service_rooms.description: Damp, moldy, and filled with the sound of a washing machine that never stops.

utility_and_service_rooms.name: Wine Cellar
utility_and_service_rooms.description: Dark, cobwebbed, and filled with bottles of wine that may or may not be blood.

mysterious_and_forbidden_areas.name: Secret Study
mysterious_and_forbidden_areas.description: Hidden behind a bookshelf or painting, containing forbidden knowledge or a portal to another realm.

mysterious_and_forbidden_areas.name: Attic
mysterious_and_forbidden_areas.description: Dusty, cluttered, and home to forgotten relics, old dolls, and perhaps a trapped spirit.

mysterious_and_forbidden_areas.name: Basement/Dungeon
mysterious_and_forbidden_areas.description: A place of torment, with chains on the walls, strange symbols, and something lurking in the dark.

mysterious_and_forbidden_areas.name: Chapel/Crypt
mysterious_and_forbidden_areas.description: A place of worship or burial, with stained glass windows, coffins, and restless spirits.

outdoor_and_connecting_spaces.name: Conservatory/Greenhouse
outdoor_and_connecting_spaces.description: Overgrown with deadly plants, or home to a ghostly gardener.

outdoor_and_connecting_spaces.name: Courtyard/Garden
outdoor_and_connecting_spaces.description: Statues that seem to watch you, a dried-up fountain, and graves hidden among the roses.

outdoor_and_connecting_spaces.name: Hallways and Staircases
outdoor_and_connecting_spaces.description: Long, winding corridors with doors that lead nowhere, or staircases that change direction.

unique_and_thematic_rooms.name: Music Room
unique_and_thematic_rooms.description: A piano that plays by itself, sheet music with ominous notes, and the sound of phantom singing.

unique_and_thematic_rooms.name: Art Gallery
unique_and_thematic_rooms.description: Portraits with eyes that follow you, or paintings that change when you're not looking.

unique_and_thematic_rooms.name: Bathroom
unique_and_thematic_rooms.description: A clawfoot tub filled with rusty water, a mirror that shows a distorted reflection, and the sound of dripping.

unique_and_thematic_rooms.name: Clock Tower
unique_and_thematic_rooms.description: A massive, broken clock that ticks backward, and a view of the stormy grounds.
